entities.name: mad-eye
entities.description: Mad-Eye is a person who shouts instructions to Harry and the others as they fly on broomsticks. ("Bearing south!" shouted Mad-Eye.)

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is a person who is flying with Harry and the others on broomsticks. She is angry at Mad-Eye's suggestion to fly through clouds. ("We're not going through clouds!" shouted Tonks angrily.)

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is flying on the Firebolt broomstick with Mad-Eye and Tonks. He is relieved to hear Tonks' suggestion not to fly through clouds. ("Harry was relieved to hear her say this; his hands were growing numb on the Firebolt's handle.")

entities.name: firebolt
entities.description: The Firebolt is a broomstick that Harry is flying on. ("his hands were growing numb on the Firebolt's handle.")

relationships.description: Mad-Eye gives instructions to Harry as they fly on broomsticks. ("Bearing south!" shouted Mad-Eye.)
Tonks disagrees with Mad-Eye's suggestion to fly through clouds. ("We're not going through clouds!" shouted Tonks angrily.)
Harry is riding the Firebolt broomstick as they fly through the air. ("his hands were growing numb on the Firebolt's handle.")
